main.message: Buri chal ka wabal us ke karne wale hi par padta hai
Jo neki tum apne liye aage bhejoge, use Allah ke paas jaa kr behtar se behtar aur swaab me bohot zyada paoge
Tumhare darmiyaan ek jamaat aisi honi chahiye jis ke afrad (logon ko) bhalayi ki taraf bulaye, acche kaamon ka hukum de aur buraayi se roke aur yahi log kamiyaab hone wale hai
Allah ke nazdeek tum me sab se zyada izzat wala wo hai, jo tum me sab se zyada mattaqi (parhezgaar) ho
Agar tum acche kaam karoge to, apne hi fayde ke liye karoge
Beshak namaaz behayaai aur bure kaamo se rokti hai
Momin mardo se keh do ke woh apni nigahen aur apni sharamgaahon ki hifazat kare, yahi un ke liye sab se zyada pakeeza hai
Padho apne parwardigaar ka naam le kar jis ne sab kuch paida kiya, us ne insaan ko jame hue khoon se paida kiya
Jo koi Allah ka sukr ada karta hai, wo khud apne zaati faide ke liye sukr karta hai aur agr koi naashukri kare, to Allah bada beniyaaz, badi khoobiyon wala hai
Yakeen rakho ke tumhara rab hi sab ko paida karne wala, sab kuch janne wala hai
Jo log (is quraan par) imaan la kar nek amal karte hai, to (ye Quraan) unhe khushkhabri deta hai ke un ke liye bada ajr hai
Jo bhi bura amal karega, us ki saza payega
Jab koi baat kaho, to insaaf se kaam lo, chahe muamla apne qareebi rishtedaar hi ka ho
(Logo ke saath) neki karo, beshak Allah neki karne waalon se muhabbat karta hai
Zina ke paas bhi na phatko, wo yaqeeni taur par badi behayaai aur bohot bura rasta hai
Jo log apne maal Allah ke raaste me kharch karte hai phir kharch karne ke baad na ehsaasjatlaate hai aur na koi takleef pahonchta hai, wo apne parwardigaar ke paas apna sawaab payege
Agar tum nek ban jao, to Allah un logon ki khataaye bohot maaf karta hai, jo kasrat se us ki taraf mutawajjeh hote hai
Aye imaan waalo! tum aisi baat kyu kehte ho jo karte nhi ho? Allah ke nazdeek ye baat badi naraazgi ki hai ke tum aisi baat kaho jo khud karte nhi
Tumhara rab khoob janta hai ke tumhare dilon me kya hai
Tumhara parwardigaar kisi par koi zulm nhi karega
Jo shakhs kisi ki jaan bacha le, to ye aisa hai jaise us ne tamaam insaano ki jaan bacha li
Din ke dono siron par aur raat ke kuch hisson me namaaz qaaim karo. Yaqeenan nekiyaan buraaiyon ko mita deti hai. Yeh ek haseehat hai, un logo ke liye jo naseehat maane
Jo sawaal karne waala ho, use mat jhidko
Allah tumhare saath asani ka muamla karne chahta hai aur tumhare liye mushkil paida  karna nhi chahta
